title: ðŸŽ¶All I want for Chriximas is Yu (Yu as in Han Kuo-yu)ðŸŽµ
contents:
I don't want a lot for Chriximas
There is just one thing I need
I don't care about the prisoners
Underneath the crooked tree
...

I just want Yu for my own
More than you could ever know
Make my wish come true oh
All I want for Chriximas is Yu

I won't ask for much this Chriximas
I won't even wish for a poo(h), and I
I just wanna keep on waiting
Underneath the mistle-toad
I won't make a list and send it
To the Northwest for a roundup of Huns
I won't even stay awake
To see those firing squads load up on guns
'Cause I just want you here tonight
Holding on to me so tight
What more can I do
Oh, Baby all I want for Christmas is Yu
